projects.title: Bit-Tick M5 OS
projects.blurb: Custom firmware for M5Stack devices, integrating the Bit-Tick Bitcoin price ticker stack with standalone display, secure update handling, and microcontroller-optimized logic.

projects.title: Bit-Tick Wio OS
projects.blurb: Firmware build for Wio Terminal units, enabling Bitcoin price feeds, Lightning stats, and API-driven visualization in a handheld hardware environment.

projects.title: Cryptainer Device Firmware
projects.blurb: Low-level firmware powering the Cryptainer secure storage device. Manages Glyph Key Sprites, dice-based RNG, layered GPG/AES/RSA encryption, and hardware I/O.

projects.title: ZZXBBC Firmware
projects.blurb: Embedded firmware stack for the ZZX Broadband Broadcast Console, handling USB camera interfacing, SD storage, encryption, and video/audio relay pipelines.

projects.title: Costanza Wallet Firmware
projects.blurb: Firmware for the Costanza Bitcoin hardware wallet. Implements advanced key handling, SHA3-256 based address generation, and offline-first cold storage design.
